sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { UilArrowUp, UilArrowDown, UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset } from "@iconscout/react-unicons" import { formatToLocalTime, urlIconCreator } from '../services/services' const TempAndDetails = ({weather: { details, icon, temp, temp_min, temp_max, sunrise, sunset, speed, humidity, feels_like, timezone }}) => { return (

{details}

{`${temp}`}°

Feels Like: {`${feels_like.toFixed()}`}°
Humidity: {`${humidity.toFixed()}`}%
Wind: {`${speed.toFixed()}`}km/hr

Rise: {formatToLocalTime(sunrise, timezone, 'hh:mm a')}

|

Set: {formatToLocalTime(sunset, timezone, 'hh:mm a')}

|

High: {`${temp_max.toFixed()}`}°

|

Low: {`${temp_min.toFixed()}`}°

) } export default TempAndDetails
